title: Senator Harry Reid: "The Good Fight"
description: Michael's conversation with the late Senator Harry Reid (D-NV) with his then new book "The Good Fight: Hard Lessons from Searchlight to Washington." Original air date 8 May 2008. The book was published on 1 May 2008.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Harry Reid, Michael Smerconish)
